ygData.subject: Re: The Lucid Lullaby
ygData.msgSnippet: Anyone who wants to buy a boat on Povar, let me know... Rolande the Bardic Pirate! ... From: Talies the Wanderer  To: eqbards@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
Anyone who wants to buy a boat on Povar, let me know...
Rolande the Bardic Pirate!
-----Original Message-----
From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, July 20, 1999 12:18 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] The Lucid Lullaby


>From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>
>
>At 12:19 PM 7/20/99 -0400, you wrote:
>>From: "Omega8" <omega8@...>
>>
>>Ok, I've seen MANY people talking about using those silly little canoe's
you
>>see all over the place.... I've tried getting in them, I've tried sitting
in
>>them, somehow I am apparently missing something.
>>
>>Some kind soul want to clue me in on how you use the darned things?
>
>Stand and click on the hull of the boat (like you're trying to open a
>door). It will say something like "You have the helm"
>
>Talies the Wanderer (who discovered that by accident)
